line_1: I ken't her heart was a' my ain;
line_2: I kiss'd her owre and owre again,

line_1: An' I'll get the laddie and a' o' my ain;
line_2: But I'll get to singing an' dancing again,

line_1: She's gotten Bardies o' her ain,
line_2: Auld COILA, now, may fidge fu' fain,

line_1: She's gotten Bardies o' her ain,
line_2: Chiels wha their chanters winna hain,

line_1: She's gotten Bardies o' her ain,
